rules.name: Is_Initiate_Round_Robin_set_to_true
rules.label: Is Initiate Round Robin set to true

rules.name: Does_Owner_Role_Not_Contain_AE1_AE2_AE3
rules.conditionLogic: NOT(1) AND NOT(2) AND NOT(3) AND 4
rules.label: Does Owner Role Not Contain AE1/AE2/AE3

decisions.description: GTMS-22483: Created as part of Partner Application project CR changes to check if the lead is new partner application or new user registration for existing partner
decisions.name: User_Authorization_Check
decisions.label: User Authorization Check

Flow.description: GTMS-22249: Updated Status fields assignment in create PR records element for existing leads and for new leads GTMS:22483: Created as part of Partner Application project GTMS-25123: Removed or Replaced Reseller View managed package references in the flow on 10/21/24 GTMS-22483: Updated Partner_Application_PR_Status formula value based on the CR changes on 11/7/24 GTMS-25477: Added field mapping for Partner Representative Email and Tell Us About Your Company fields values from lead on 11/26/24 GTMS-25570: SFDC Reservoir: Auto Deny Partner Deal Reg on 12/10/24 GTMS-25777: Excluding initiating RR login fro new Deal Reg Account with owner as SFDC Pool until PAM approves the Deal Registration. GTMS-27751 : PR Status Changes/Update post Account owner change(Round Robin) GTMS-26104 : Partner Applications: Update Partner Application fields

formulas.description: GTMS-22483: Created as part of Partner Application project CR changes to check if the lead is new partner application or new user registration for existing partner
formulas.name: Is_New_Partner_Check

formulas.description: GTMS-22483: Created as part of Partner Application Phase 2 project to map status value base on the lead status field
formulas.name: Partner_Application_PR_Status
formulas.expression: IF( ISPICKVAL({!Get_Lead_info.Status},'Disqualified'),'Denied', IF( OR( {!Get_Lead_info.Is_User_Authorization__c}, NOT({!Is_New_Partner_Check}) ), 'New User Registration', 'New Application' ) )

formulas.description: GTMS-22483: Created as part of partner application project to map PR record type based on lead Is User Authorization Field
formulas.name: Record_Type_Id

formulas.description: GTMS-22249: Created as part of Partner Alignment project. To create PR records for existing leads and for new leads
formulas.name: Status_Formula

formulas.description: GTMS-27751: Created as part of Partner Alignment project - To redo the formula once the round-robin of account is completed.
formulas.name: StatusFormula_New
